name: nopgadgetautomationtest
description: Automated testing suite for NopCommerce Gadget application using Playwright with environment-driven configuration

scripts.test:dev: cross-env BASE_URL=http://localhost:88 HEADLESS=false npx playwright test
scripts.test:staging: cross-env BASE_URL=https://staging.yourapp.com HEADLESS=true npx playwright test
scripts.test:prod: cross-env BASE_URL=https://yourapp.com HEADLESS=true RETRIES=2 npx playwright test
scripts.test:ci: cross-env CI=true RETRIES=2 WORKERS=2 HEADLESS=true npx playwright test
scripts.test:custom-user: cross-env TEST_EMAIL=%npm_config_email% TEST_PASSWORD=%npm_config_password% npx playwright test
scripts.test:different-user: cross-env TEST_EMAIL=different@test.com TEST_PASSWORD=differentpass npx playwright test
scripts.test:headed-slow: cross-env HEADLESS=false SLOW_MO=1000 npx playwright test
scripts.test:headed-debug: cross-env HEADLESS=false DEBUG=true npx playwright test --debug
scripts.env:check: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); console.log('Environment variables loaded:', Object.keys(process.env).filter(k => k.startsWith('TEST_')).length)"
scripts.env:validate: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const required=['BASE_URL','TEST_EMAIL','TEST_PASSWORD']; const missing=required.filter(k => !process.env[k]); if(missing.length) { console.error('Missing:', missing); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('All required env vars present'); }"
scripts.setup:complete: npm install && npm run test:install && npm run setup:env
